message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a generous offer considering I get to make the first move.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than you. Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, you drive a hard bargain, but let's be realistic. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it before inflation shrinks the pot even further.
